amendment.description: An amendment No. 20 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to clarifies that motor carriers who have not been prioritized for a compliance review by FMCSA due to their safe operations are equal in safety status to "satisfactory" rated carriers.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Duncan (TN) amendment was withdrawn.
Duncan (TN) amendment (A061) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Duncan (TN) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Duncan (TN) to the Rules amendment (A001).
